entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
